query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total,
  SUM(CASE WHEN id_paciente LIKE 'MIG-%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as migrados,
  SUM(CASE WHEN id_paciente NOT LIKE 'MIG-%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as outros
FROM pacientes WHERE tenant_id = 1;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2eJNWYGY92vZU3w.root --database TyeFpW5ykZHTuZXuk6iMG7 --execute SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total,
  SUM(CASE WHEN id_paciente LIKE 'MIG-%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as migrados,
  SUM(CASE WHEN id_paciente NOT LIKE 'MIG-%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as outros
FROM pacientes WHERE tenant_id = 1;
